mutants.code:
import numpy as np

def calculate_mean_sic(sicmo, years, start_year, end_year):
    yearq = np.where((years >= start_year) & (years <= end_year))[0]
    mean_sic = np.nanmean(sicmo[yearq, :, :], axis=0) / 100
    return mean_sic

    return mean_sic
